name: Zebra_Datepicker
summary: A lightweight date picker plugin for jQuery
short_description: Zebra_Datepicker is a small, compact and highly configurable date picker plugin for jQuery, meant to enrich forms by adding a datepicker functionality. It works by automatically adding a calendar icon to the indicated input fields, which users can then click to open up an inline date picker. Users can easily jump between months and years due to the intuitive interface and finally, the selected date will be entered in the input field using a specified date format.
